verses.text: Now these \add are\add* they that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, while he yet kept himself \w close|strong="H6113"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*: and they \add were\add* among the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w* of the \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 12.1 \ft while…: Heb. being yet shut up\f*

\add They were\add* \w armed|strong="H5401"\w* with \w bows|strong="H7198"\w*, and could use both the right \w hand|strong="H3231"\w* and the \w left|strong="H8041"\w* in \add hurling\add* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* and \add shooting\add* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* out of a \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \add even\add* of \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

The \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \add was\add* \w Ahiezer|strong="H0295"\w*, then \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaah|strong="H8094"\w* the \w Gibeathite|strong="H1395"\w*; and \w Jeziel|strong="H3149"\w*, and \w Pelet|strong="H6404"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*; and \w Berachah|strong="H1294"\w*, and \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w Antothite|strong="H6069"\w*,\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Shemaah: or, Hasmaah\f*

And \w Ismaiah|strong="H3460"\w* the \w Gibeonite|strong="H1393"\w*, a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* among the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, and over the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*; and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, and \w Jahaziel|strong="H3166"\w*, and \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w*, and \w Josabad|strong="H3107"\w* the \w Gederathite|strong="H1452"\w*,

\w Eluzai|strong="H0498"\w*, and \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w*, and \w Bealiah|strong="H1183"\w*, and \w Shemariah|strong="H8114"\w*, and \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w* the \w Haruphite|strong="H2741"\w*,

\w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, and \w Jesiah|strong="H3449"\w*, and \w Azareel|strong="H5832"\w*, and \w Joezer|strong="H3134"\w*, and \w Jashobeam|strong="H3434"\w*, the \w Korhites|strong="H7145"\w*,
And \w Joelah|strong="H3132"\w*, and \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w* of \w Gedor|strong="H1446"\w*.

And of the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w* there \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* themselves unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* into the \w hold|strong="H4679"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w might|strong="H2428"\w*, \add and\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H6635"\w* \add fit\add* for the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, that could \w handle|strong="H6186"\w* \w shield|strong="H6793"\w* and \w buckler|strong="H7420"\w*, whose \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \add were like\add* the \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* of \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*, and \add were\add* as \w swift|strong="H4116"\w* as the \w roes|strong="H6643"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*;\f + \fr 12.8 \ft of war: Heb. of the host\f*\f + \fr 12.8 \ft as swift…: Heb. as the roes upon the mountains to make haste\f*
\w Ezer|strong="H5829"\w* the \w first|strong="H7218"\w*, \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*,
\w Mishmannah|strong="H4925"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*, \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*,
\w Attai|strong="H6262"\w* the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w*, \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w*,
\w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w*, \w Elzabad|strong="H0443"\w* the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w*,
\w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w*, \w Machbanai|strong="H4344"\w* the \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w*.

These \add were\add* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* \add was\add* over an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, and the \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* over a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.\f + \fr 12.14 \ft one…: or, one that was least could resist an hundred, and the greatest a thousand\f*

These \add are\add* they that went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, when it had \w overflown|strong="H4390"\w* all his \w banks|strong="H1415"\w*; and they put to \w flight|strong="H1272"\w* all \add them\add* of the \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w*, \add both\add* toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, and toward the \w west|strong="H4628"\w*.\f + \fr 12.15 \ft overflown: Heb. filled over\f*

And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* to the \w hold|strong="H4679"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* them, and \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, If ye be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w peaceably|strong="H7965"\w* unto me to \w help|strong="H5826"\w* me, mine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall be \w knit|strong="H3162"\w* unto you: but if \add ye be come\add* to \w betray|strong="H7411"\w* me to mine \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*, seeing \add there is\add* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w wrong|strong="H2555"\w* in mine \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \add thereon\add*, and \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 12.17 \ft to meet…: Heb. before them\f*\f + \fr 12.17 \ft be knit: Heb. be one\f*\f + \fr 12.17 \ft wrong: or, violence\f*

Then the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w came|strong="H3847"\w* upon \w Amasai|strong="H6022"\w*, \add who was\add* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w captains|strong="H7970"\w*, \add and he said\add*, Thine \add are we\add*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and on thy side, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*: \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* unto thee, and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* to thine \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w*; for thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w helpeth|strong="H5826"\w* thee. Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w received|strong="H6901"\w* them, and \w made|strong="H5414"\w* them \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w band|strong="H1416"\w*.\f + \fr 12.18 \ft came…: Heb. clothed\f*

And there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \add some\add* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* against \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: but they \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* them not: for the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* upon \w advisement|strong="H6098"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him away, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, He will \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* to his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to \add the jeopardy of\add* our \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 12.19 \ft to the…: Heb. on our heads\f*

As he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* to him of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Adnah|strong="H5734"\w*, and \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, and \w Jediael|strong="H3043"\w*, and \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, and \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, and \w Elihu|strong="H0453"\w*, and \w Zilthai|strong="H6769"\w*, \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* that \add were\add* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

And they \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* against the \w band|strong="H1416"\w* \add of the rovers:\add* for they \add were\add* all mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, and were \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* in the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 12.21 \ft against…: or, with a band\f*

For at \add that\add* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* by \w day|strong="H3117"\w* there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w help|strong="H5826"\w* him, until \add it was\add* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, like the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And these \add are\add* the \w numbers|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w bands|strong="H7218"\w* \add that were\add* ready \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* to the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, \add and\add* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, to \w turn|strong="H5437"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to him, according to the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.23 \ft bands: or, captains, or, men: Heb. heads\f*

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \w shield|strong="H6793"\w* and \w spear|strong="H7420"\w* \add were\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, ready \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* to the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 12.24 \ft armed: or, prepared\f*

Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w* for the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and one \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.
Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \add was\add* the \w leader|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w Aaronites|strong="H0175"\w*, and with him \add were\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*;

And \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, a young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, and of his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w*.

And of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, the \w kindred|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*: for hitherto the \w greatest|strong="H4768"\w* part of them had \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w ward|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.\f + \fr 12.29 \ft kindred: Heb. brethren\f*\f + \fr 12.29 \ft the greatest…: Heb. a multitude of them\f*

And of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \w famous|strong="H8034"\w* throughout the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 12.30 \ft famous: Heb. men of names\f*

And of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, which were \w expressed|strong="H5344"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and make \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*.

And of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \add which were men\add* that had \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* of the \w times|strong="H6256"\w*, to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* ought to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of them \add were\add* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*; and all their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \add were\add* at their \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w*.

Of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, such as went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*, \w expert|strong="H6186"\w* in \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, with all \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, which could keep \w rank|strong="H5737"\w*: \add they were\add* not of \w double|strong="H3820"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 12.33 \ft expert…: or, rangers of battle, or, ranged in battle\f*\f + \fr 12.33 \ft keep…: or, set the battle in array\f*\f + \fr 12.33 \ft not…: Heb. without a heart and a heart\f*

And of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w*, and with them with \w shield|strong="H6793"\w* and \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And of the \w Danites|strong="H1839"\w* \w expert|strong="H6186"\w* in \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, such as went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*, \w expert|strong="H6186"\w* in \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.\f + \fr 12.36 \ft expert: or, keeping their rank\f*

And on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, of the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, with all manner of \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H6635"\w* for the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

All these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, that could \w keep|strong="H5737"\w* \w rank|strong="H4634"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with a \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, to make \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and all the \w rest|strong="H7611"\w* also of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were\add* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to make \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*.

And there they were with \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*: for their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for them.

Moreover they that were \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* them, \add even\add* unto \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* and \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* and \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* on \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and on \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, and on \w mules|strong="H6505"\w*, and on \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \add and\add* \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*, \w meal|strong="H7058"\w*, \w cakes|strong="H1690"\w* of figs, and bunches of \w raisins|strong="H6778"\w*, and \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H7230"\w*: for \add there was\add* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 12.40 \ft meat…: or, victual of meal\f*
